VL_19xZ5-t_Y_RWSttE6HA.text: Wow, what a breakfast. Worth hunting out. If you are in the area and need a great breakfast with a good coffee - highly recommended!  They have also got fast password protected wifi.

photos.caption: Photo of Up The Junction - Edinburgh, United Kingdom. A great breakfast

ZuJ5_4UapsX94CH0Cq1W1Q.text: Up the junction was one of the best places I've eaten. Very proper Scottish breakfast and an amazing cappuccino. The owner/server was so kind to us. They had run out of cream cheese and they actually went to the store to get some so we could have it for our bagels! I would highly recommend this for a quick easy breakfast! Thank you for the kind service while we are visiting Edinburgh!

MXapMtxLHhFtastFRmzs0Q.text: Recently taken over and renovated after years under the same  management this is now a clean well managed cafe with a more extensive but still basic menu. Great fried breakfasts, morning rolls, burgers, daily specials. Now serving espresso based coffee.  I like the people who run the cafe - friendly, attentive, eager to please.

photos.caption: Photo of Up The Junction - Edinburgh, United Kingdom

vy4FY36KFApmg58q__CVDg.text: This is how cafes were before the dawn of cappcuinos and muffins. A greasy spoon and a good one at that.   After a particularly late night and a few hours kip on a friends floor, we headed to this place for the best breakfast ever. My flatmate swears by their bacon rolls. It was a fried egg sandwich for me with a big mug of tea and I was right as rain...almost.
